post:
Hello, We have over 10 years experience with web hosting and servers. We provide 99.9% uptime and real support. Our VPS's are cheap, Port limited for quiet neighbors on the node.

We at Dos Servers (Beta VPS & Enter VPS part of Dos Servers) aren't so new in hosting industry, We operating from 2010 with servers in Canada, USA, Germany and France.

Overview of all Packages here: [BetaVPS.net](http://www.BetaVPS.net) & [EnterVPS.com](http://EnterVPS.com)

**Minimum Server Specifications:**

Intel Xeon E3 - 1230
16GB DDRIII 1333 RAM
2x 1TB SATAIII Harddisk RAID 1
Network Port: 100Mbps

**Every VPS has port limit you can use the full speed all the time 24/7 as it Unmetered Bandwidth**
